markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Climbing Tail](/Feats.aspx?ID=4001) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vanara" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=368" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 55</row>

</column>

---

Your tail makes it much easier for you to climb. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=33), you gain the [Combat Climber](/Feats.aspx?ID=768) skill feat, and you reduce the number of free hands required to Climb or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) by one.

<title level="2">Climbing Tail leads to...</title>
[Dangle (Vanara)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4012)
name: Climbing Tail
